scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version && tsc --pretty --project tsconfig-publish.json && cp -r package.json README.md part-1/cdk/resources lib/
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run pac && cdk deploy
scripts.pac: rimraf assets && mkdir -p assets/get && cd php/ && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev && cd - && cp php/handlers/get.php assets/get && cp -r php/vendor assets/get && cp -r php/src assets/get && cd -
